text: Ángela Gerónima Sureda de Santo (7 July 1921 — 5 February 2021) was an Argentine teacher, lawyer and politician. She was a deputy of the Unión Cívica Radical for the national district from 1981 to 1983. Sureda was born in Río Gallegos, Argentina. Sureda died on 5 February 2021 in Río Gallegos, aged 99. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Argentine politicians
title: Ángela Sureda
